sy: More than just a beverage, coffee is the centerpiece of Miami culture. So much so, Miami even has it's own official coffee break time, aka #305Cafecito. Loyal Miamians can choose to sip $2 Cuban cafecitos at the famous Versailles, experiment with caffeine concoctions at The Alchemist, or even consort with hipsters all day at Panther coffee. Â¡Salud!
